LanguageDetection.title: Language Suggestion
LanguageDetection.description: We noticed your browser language differs from the current site language. You can switch languages anytime.

Home.title: BestMaker AI
Home.tagLine: AI Image Editor Built by BestMaker AI
Home.description: BestMaker AI gives you a Photoshop-level editor powered by natural language. Remove elements, change backgrounds, and build mockups with precise prompts—no manual masking required.

Login.title: Welcome back
Login.description: Sign in with the following methods

Email.successDescription: Please check your email for the login link.
Email.errorDescription: Failed to send magic link. Please try again.

Google.errorDescription: Failed to sign in with Google. Please try again.

Github.errorDescription: Failed to sign in with Github. Please try again.

Blogs.title: Blog Posts
Blogs.description: Insights on Next.js ecosystem and Nexty.dev template updates.

emptyState.title: No blog posts
emptyState.description: We are creating exciting content, please stay tuned!

Blogs.noPostsFoundForThisTag: No posts found with this tag
Blogs.reachedTheEnd: You've reached the end of all posts

BlogDetail.unauthorized: This article is only available to logged-in users
BlogDetail.premiumContent: This article is exclusive to subscribers

403.title: 403 - Access Denied
403.description: You don't have permission to access this page.

RedirectError.title: Redirect Error
RedirectError.description: An error occurred during the authentication process.

invalid_params.title: Invalid Parameters
invalid_params.description: Required parameters are missing in the request.

invalid_redirect.title: Invalid Redirect URL
invalid_redirect.description: The redirect URL provided is not allowed.

token_expired.title: Token Expired
token_expired.description: Your verification token has expired. Please try logging in again.

invalid_token.title: Invalid Token
invalid_token.description: The verification token provided is invalid.

invalid_link_or_expired.title: Invalid or Expired Link
invalid_link_or_expired.description: The email verification link is invalid or has expired.

server_error.title: Server Error
server_error.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server during authentication.

unknown.title: Authentication Error
unknown.description: An unknown error occurred during the authentication process.

StripeError.title: Payment Portal Error
StripeError.description: An error occurred with your payment information.
